name: CityBean Coffee Demo Workspace
description: Demo workspace for CityBean Coffee with seed conversations covering market and operations topics.

assistants.name: Market
assistants.description: External-facing copy, investor comms, competitor intel, campaign ideas.
assistants.instructions: You are Market, CityBean Coffee’s marketing assistant. Produce concise, brand-consistent external communications and insights.

assistants.name: Operations
assistants.description: Internal KPIs, scheduling advice, SOP drafting, supply chain analytics.
assistants.instructions: You are Operations, CityBean Coffee’s operational assistant. Provide data-driven answers, schedules, procedures, and analytics.

messages.text: Morning! Give me real-time sales, labor, and waste numbers.

children.text: Here’s the live dashboard: total sales $43,280 (+3.2% vs yesterday), labor cost 28.5%, waste 14% at Store #7 (target ≤ 8%). I’ve flagged Store #7 for follow-up.

messages.text: Forecast shows rain at noon. How should we adjust staffing?

children.text: Move one barista from lobby to drive-thru at Stores #3, #8, and #12 between 12:00-15:00. Expected wait-time drop: 18 s. Draft schedule sent to managers.

messages.text: Need a 10-sec TikTok hook for the pumpkin latte launch.

children.text: Script: ‘Watch beans turn to pumpkin magic in 10 sec.’ Visual: slow-mo latte art swirl ➜ quick pumpkin stencil ➜ sip and smile. Hashtags: #PumpkinDevOps #BeanFlow #FallFuel

messages.text: Draft a 120-word Q3 update for investors. Mention franchise revenue growth.

children.text: CityBean Coffee closed Q3 with 17% franchise revenue growth, fueled by 4 new cafés and 11% same-store sales lift. BeanFlow optimized roast cycles, cutting waste by 6 %. Loyalty app hit 210 k MAUs, and TikTok engagement tripled. We remain on track for 40 locations by FY-end and continue to reinvest in sustainable sourcing.

messages.text: Write email + IG copy for Saturday’s latte art class with Eventbrite link https://evt.bz/latte-art.

children.text: Email subject: ‘Foam Like a Pro This Saturday’. Body: ‘Learn rosettas & hearts from our champion baristas. 9 AM at Flagship Café. Seats limited ➜ RSVP’. IG caption: ‘From bean to art – master latte art 6/8 ☕🎨 Sign-up in bio’.

messages.text: Compare BellaVista vs Alianza Colombian suppliers on cost and quality.

children.text: BellaVista: $4.12/lb, 87 SCA score, 3-day lead. Alianza: $4.28/lb, 88 SCA, 7-day lead. Switching fully to BellaVista cuts COGS 4 % with negligible taste delta.

messages.text: Rewrite loyalty FAQ and add Spanish translation.

children.text:
Updated FAQ:
1. How do I earn Beans? — Earn 1 Bean per $1.
2. How to redeem? — 50 Beans = free drink.
(Spanish below.)

1. ¿Cómo gano Beans? — 1 Bean por cada $1.
2. ¿Cómo canjeo? — 50 Beans = bebida gratis.

messages.text: Compress 4-page opening SOP into a 1-page printable.

children.text:
1. Power-on espresso & grinders
2. Calibrate shots (±1 s)
3. Prep milk jugs & alt-milks
4. Stock pastry case
5. Run waste check
6. Open POS lane
7. Team huddle (2 min).

messages.text: Need 3-minute voice-over script introducing BeanFlow basics.

children.text:
[0:00-0:30] Welcome & mission
[0:30-1:30] BeanFlow dashboard tour (live KPIs, roast planning)
[1:30-2:15] Loyalty & POS integration
[2:15-3:00] Support & next steps. End with call-to-action: ‘Log in and explore your first KPI pulse.’

messages.text: POS timestamps show drive-thru delays at Store #12. Root cause?

children.text: Median order-to-pay is 88 s (target 60 s). Grinder B cleaning at 10 AM added 22 s per drink. Recommend schedule cleaning at 14 PM and retrain baristas on dual-grinder workflow.

messages.text: Starbucks raised latte prices. Summarize impact on our margins.

children.text: Starbucks +$0.40 average. Our price gap widens to $0.25. Maintaining current pricing yields +6 % perceived value; we can absorb up to +$0.15 without losing parity.

messages.text: Pitch 5 winter drinks; Ops to check COGS.

children.text:
1. Fireside Mocha
2. Cardamom Cold Brew
3. Cranberry White Flat
4. Ginger Snap Latte
5. Midnight Mint. Avg COGS: 28-32 %.

messages.text: OT cost spiked yesterday. What happened?

children.text: Sick leave overlap at Stores #2 & #6 caused double OT shifts (12 h). Alert sent to scheduling bot to auto search swaps.

messages.text: Crash logs attached. Format GitHub issue.

children.text: Created issue #245: ‘NullPointer in RewardsManager.onLogin’. Steps to reproduce, stack trace, severity high, assignee @mobile-team.

messages.text: Give bullet outline for board deck with chart placeholders.

children.text:
Slide 1: Title + FY context
Slide 2: 12-mo SSS trend [chart]
Slide 3: Drivers (loyalty, menu)
Slide 4: Regional split [heatmap]
Slide 5: Action plan & targets.

messages.text: Draft spec & scoring matrix for new grinders.

children.text: Spec: 2.5 g/s grind speed, 0.1 s tolerance, IoT telemetry. Scoring: Cost 30 %, Durability 30 %, Consistency 25 %, Service 15 %. Template sheet attached.

messages.text: Reformat HACCP section to bullets, update FDA temps.

children.text:
Critical temps:
• Milk ≤ 41 °F
• Poultry ≥ 165 °F
• Cooling 135 → 70 °F in 2 h.
Added checklist for daily log sign-off.

messages.text: Futures price dropped. Should we lock Q1 contracts?

children.text: ICE Arabica fell 6 % to $1.48/lb. Locking 70 % of Q1 volume now saves ~$42 k vs last contract; reserve 30 % for possible further dips.

messages.text: Need ad copy + alt text for Shopify banner.

children.text: Banner text: ‘Wrap Joy in a Cup – Gift Cards Now Live’. Alt: ‘Hand holding CityBean digital gift card with snowflake overlay’.

messages.text: Drawer variance $180 yesterday. Outline investigation steps.

children.text:
1. Pull CCTV 18:00-22:00
2. Compare POS voids
3. Interview closers
4. Audit cash log vs deposits. Email template drafted for manager.

messages.text: Convert Excel royalty logic into SQL and validate.

children.text: SQL snippet: `SELECT sales*0.05 AS royalty FROM monthly_sales WHERE franchisee_id=?`. Validated 50 sample rows – matches Excel within 0.01 %.

messages.text: Oat-milk share up 11 %. Show cost impact and draft renegotiation email.

children.text: Cost impact: +$0.032 per drink, +$7.8k/mo. Draft email: ‘Volume up 11 %, seeking bulk price adjustment to $1.82/L. Happy to extend contract 12 mo.’

messages.text: Need 400-word sustainability recap.

children.text: [Opening] In 2025 CityBean composted 92 t of grounds, offset 480 t CO₂, and sourced 86 % Rainforest Alliance beans… [truncated at 400 words].

messages.text: Forecast sunny weekend. Craft geo SMS offers.

children.text: SMS: ‘☀️ Sun bonus! Flash this text for BOGO cold brew today only’. Geo-target: cafés within 5 mi of parks.

messages.text: Tally votes & tweet winner copy.

children.text: Votes: Aria (35), Leo (29), Mina (27). Tweet: ‘🎉 Congrats Aria – our Latte-Art champ! Check her swan pour this weekend.’

messages.text: A/B test subject lines for matcha promo; pick winner.

children.text: Tested ‘Meet Your Matcha’ (32% open) vs ‘Green Goodness Inside’ (24%). Choose ‘Meet Your Matcha’.

messages.text: Managers PTO overlaps next week. Propose swap and notify HR.

children.text: Suggested swap: Miller (North Side) trades with Patel (Riverside) for Wed-Thu. Notification email queued to HR + both managers.

messages.text: Summarize CRM pipeline: hot leads and legal review.

children.text: 6 hot leads (Austin, Denver, Boise...) and 3 in legal (Phoenix, Tampa, Tacoma). Visual pipeline chart attached.

messages.text: Heatmap shows dead corner. Suggest merch move.

children.text: Relocate pastry display to north wall, shift merch to entry sightline. Expected uplift: +7 % pastry sales.

messages.text: Draft 1-page 2026 vision + CapEx forecast appendix.

children.text: Vision: 40 cafés, 60% app orders, zero waste-to-landfill. CapEx: $3.4 M equipment, $1.2 M IT, $0.6 M training. Memo draft attached.
